original_text: And the thickness of it was an handbreadth, and the brim of it like the work of the brim of a cup, with flowers of lilies; and it received and held three thousand baths.
korean_text: 바다의 두께는 한 손 너비만 하고 그 둘레는 잔 둘레와 같이 백합화의 모양으로 만들었으니 그 바다에는 삼천 밧을 담겠으며

sentences.original_text: And the thickness of it was an handbreadth
and the brim of it like the work of the brim of a cup
sentences.korean_translation: 그것의 가장자리는 잔 가장자리의 모양과 같았으며

sentences.original_text: and it received and held three thousand baths
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 삼천 밧을 담을 수 있었다
